Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 1022 McCallum Road provides the opportunity to lease a build-to-suite state of the art retail/ office/ service commercial facility in a highly visible location in Greater Victoria’s fastest-growing municipality. The developer will provide the tenant with a custom-designed facility that meets specific operational requirements.

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President

Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 1022 McCallum Road provides the opportunity to lease a build-to-suite state of the art retail/ office/ service commercial facility in a highly visible location in Greater Victoria’s fastest-growing municipality. The developer will provide the tenant with a custom-designed facility that meets specific operational requirements.

The subject premises is ideal for any tenant who values proximity to the Western Communities, as well as easy access to Victoria, Saanich, and areas north of the CRD via Highway 1. Situated next to Shell and Subway, the space benefits from ample on-site parking for clients and staff as well as the opportunity for high-exposure signagefacing the highway.

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The  subject  premises  is  ideal  for  any  tenant  who values  proximity  to  the  Western  Communities,  as well  as  easy  access  to  Victoria,  Saanich,  and  areas north of the CRD via Highway 1.Situated next to Shell and Subway, the space benefits from  ample  on-site  parking  for  clients and  staff  as well  as  the  opportunity  for  high-exposure  signage facing the highway.  This  ground-level   space   is   built   out   with   open- concept  workspace  as  well  as  an office,  storage room, kitchenette, and 2 washrooms.

Located in Westhills, adjacent to YMCA Westhills

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to present the opportunity to pre-lease Class A office and restaurant/cafe space with lake and mountain views in The Plexxis Tower. The building will feature large open concept floor plates with demising options, ceiling heights of 11’8” - 18’5”, extensive glazing with floor to ceiling windows, two high speed elevators and prominent signage opportunities.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Landmark Opportunity to Lease Brand New Cafe/Rstaurant Spaces in the Heart of Westhills

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to present the opportunity to lease 1,250 Sq Ft. retail space within the brand new Elite Self Storage building. Situated on a highly visible location at West Shore Parkway and Sooke Road and is just a 5 minute drive to Langford’s core.
